title: The Great British Baking Show
description: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

title: King of Boys: The Return of the King
description: Alhaja Eniola Salami starts anew and sets her sights on a different position of power, fueled by revenge, regret and ruthlessness.

title: Gone for Good
description: Ten years after losing two loved ones, a man is plunged into another dizzying mystery when his girlfriend vanishes. Based on a Harlan Coben novel.

title: Valeria
description: A writer in creative and marital crises finds support from three friends, who are also discovering themselves. Based on the novels by Elísabet Benavent.

title: Navarasa
description: From amusement to awe, the nine human emotions of Indian aesthetic theory are explored in this anthology series.

title: Office Girls
description: A department store mogul has his son work incognito in a menial job to prove his worthiness, while female co-workers teach him how normal people live.

title: The Flash
description: A forensics expert who wakes from a coma with amazing new powers squares off against forces threatening the city in this live-action superhero romp.

title: The Mire
description: In an early-'80s Polish town, a prostitute and a youth leader are found killed, but the police's handling of the case makes two journalists suspicious.

title: Riverdale
description: While navigating the troubled waters of sex, romance, school and family, teen Archie and his gang become entangled in a dark Riverdale mystery.

title: They've Gotta Have Us
description: Powered by candid recollections from esteemed African-American entertainers, this docuseries traces the history of black cinema.

title: The American Bible Challenge
description: Join host Jeff Foxworthy as contestants test their knowledge of all things biblical, competing to win money for the charities of their choice.

title: Metallica: Some Kind of Monster
description: This collection includes the acclaimed rock documentary about Metallica, plus a film checking in with the still-thriving group 10 years later.

title: Trese
description: In Manila, where dark supernatural forces pervade the criminal underworld, it’s up to Alexandra Trese to keep the peace — but there’s a storm brewing.

title: Feel Good
description: Stand-up comic Mae Martin navigates a passionate, messy new relationship with her girlfriend, George, while dealing with the challenges of sobriety.

title: Ouran High School Host Club
description: New student Haruhi stumbles on the Ouran High School Host Club, an all-male group that makes money by entertaining the girls of the school.

title: Halston
description: His name built an empire. His style defined an era. American fashion designer Halston skyrockets to fame before his life starts to spin out of control.

title: Let's Fight Ghost
description: A med student with a supernatural gift tries to cash in on his abilities by facing off against ghosts, till a wandering spirit brings romance instead.

title: Garth Brooks: The Road I’m On
description: Revealing interviews and archive footage tell the story of Garth Brooks' humble beginnings, rise to fame and unprecedented impact on country music.

title: The Underclass
description: After getting dropped from an elite program, a student gets tangled in the affairs of a high school gang while trying to find her own identity.

title: Men on a Mission
description: Male celebs play make-believe as high schoolers, welcoming star transfer students every week and engaging in battles of witty humor and slapstick.

title: Dealer
description: Tensions erupt when two filmmakers infiltrate an area ruled by gangs to shoot a music video for a rapper in this gritty found-footage series.

title: Pitta Kathalu
description: From secrets and lies to jealousy and control, four stories in this anthology film explore the darker, deceptive sides of love.

title: The House Arrest of Us
description: A couple decides to make their engagement official by honoring tradition when a pandemic forces them and their families to quarantine under one roof.

title: Last Tango in Halifax
description: Two widowed childhood sweethearts fall for each other all over again when they are reunited over the Internet after nearly 60 years.

title: The Idhun Chronicles
description: A boy suddenly orphaned fights his parents' killer to save a planet, and discovers a new world of danger — and wonder.

title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
description: The Cat in the Hat is back – and this time, he's teaching Sally and her brother, Nick, some awfully nifty things to think about!

title: Paava Kadhaigal
description: At times dark, at times disturbing, four short films explore stories of those who dare to dream and desire — and those determined to stand in their way.

title: Schulz Saves America
description: Comedian Andrew Schulz takes on the year's most divisive topics in this fearlessly unfiltered and irreverent four-part special.

title: Anitta: Made In Honório
description: In this intimate documentary, Brazilian pop queen Anitta opens up about fame, family and her fierce work ethic, revealing the woman behind the hits.

title: Detention
description: A tormented student uncovers unsettling secrets at her remote high school as betrayal and a paranormal encounter upend her life.

title: Before 30
description: Four female friends in the fast-paced city of Lagos, Nigeria endure public and private pressures to walk down the aisle by the age of 30.

title: The Minions of Midas
description: A millionaire publisher gets a blackmail note — his decision can mean life or death. Inspired by a Jack London story but set in contemporary Madrid.

title: A Queen Is Born
description: Gloria Groove and Alexia Twister make drag dreams come true as they help six artists find the confidence to own the stage in this makeover show.

title: Afronta! Facing It!
description: This docuseries spotlights Afro-Brazilian thinkers sharing their individual journeys and discussing representation, entrepreneurship and community.

title: The Devil Punisher
description: A baker by day and demon fighter by night, a reincarnated deity must jog his amnesiac lover's memory of their millennium-long romance.

title: Someone Has to Die
description: In conservative 1950s Spain, the alleged relationship between a young man and a Mexican ballerino creates an uproar of harrowing consequences.

title: To the Lake
description: Facing the end of civilization when a terrifying plague strikes, a group risks their lives, loves — and humanity — in a brutal struggle to survive.

title: Call the Midwife
description: This period drama set in impoverished East London in the 1950s follows a newly qualified midwife and her colleagues at a nursing convent.

title: Julie and the Phantoms
description: Julie lost her passion for music when she lost her mom. But when three ghostly guys appear and lift her spirits, they decide to start a band together!

title: Thomas and Friends
description: This animated children's series follows the adventures of Thomas, a cheerful blue tank engine who lives on the island of Sodor.

title: Goedam
description: When night falls on the city, shadows and spirits come alive in this horror anthology series centered on urban legends.

title: The Twelve
description: Twelve jurors — ordinary people with struggles of their own — must decide the case of a woman accused of killing her best friend and her own daughter.

title: Hook
description: Despite their fathers' rivalry, two university students form a friendship at a boxing gym as they tackle family drama, romance and personal crises.

title: Abby Hatcher
description: A big-hearted girl helps her Fuzzly friends who live in her family's hotel with exploring feelings, fixing mishaps and embracing their special quirks.

title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
description: A mysterious "time master" from the future unites an unlikely group of superheroes and villains to save the world from a powerful evil.

title: Supernatural
description: Siblings Dean and Sam crisscross the country, investigating paranormal activity and picking fights with demons, ghosts and monsters.

title: Supergirl
description: To avert a disaster, Kara Danvers reveals her powers and true identity: She is Superman's cousin, now known as Supergirl, protector of National City.

title: Trailer Park Boys: The Animated Series
description: Nova Scotia’s favorite miscreants have always been super sketchy. Now, carrying on from the Season 12 finale, the boys have become complete cartoons.

title: Patton Oswalt: I Love Everything
description: Turning 50. Finding love again. Buying a house. Experiencing existential dread at Denny's. Life comes at Patton Oswalt fast in this stand-up special.

title: Inhuman Resources
description: Alain Delambre, unemployed and 57, is lured by an attractive job opening. But things get ugly when he realizes he’s a pawn in a cruel corporate game.

title: Sleepless Society: Two Pillows & A Lost Soul
description: A motivational speaker about to divorce her abusive husband wakes up from a wild party one morning to find a dead body.

title: The Eddy
description: The owner of a Paris jazz club gets tangled up with dangerous criminals as he fights to protect his business, his band and his teenage daughter.

title: Scissor Seven
description: Seeking to recover his memory, a scissor-wielding, hairdressing, bungling quasi-assassin stumbles into a struggle for power among feuding factions.

title: Almost Happy
description: Sebastián is a radio show host of modest fame, trying to find a way in the world as he deals with his ex-wife (whom he still loves) and two kids.

title: The Forest of Love: Deep Cut
description: Nothing's as it seems when a charismatic conman and an aspiring film crew delve into the lives of two emotionally scarred women.

title: The Victims' Game
description: After discovering his estranged daughter's link to mysterious murders, a forensic detective with Asperger's syndrome risks everything to solve the case.

title: Middleditch & Schwartz
description: Comedy duo Thomas Middleditch and Ben Schwartz turn small ideas into epically funny stories in this series of completely improvised comedy specials.

title: Fary : Hexagone
description: French comedy phenom Fary puts a playful spin on questions of identity, culture and more in the first half of an epic two-part stand-up special.

title: The Trial
description: The murder of a teen girl impacts a public prosecutor linked to the victim, a lawyer seeking a career-making case and a suspect who says she's innocent.

title: Kingdom
description: While strange rumors about their ill king grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.

title: Velvet
description: In 1950s Spain, the heir to a fashion house romances a beautiful seamstress who works for the company, despite the objections of his family.

title: Six Windows in the Desert
description: From a theatre play to the aftermath of a plane crash, this collection of shorts from Saudi filmmakers depicts the nuances of Saudi Arabian culture.

title: Unabomber - In His Own Words
description: The CIA attempts to turn Ted Kaczynski, aka the Unabomber, into a super agent — a plan that backfires. Based on real events.

title: On the Real
description: A group of reality stars transitions into their newly achieved fame while dealing with the demands of an obnoxious TV executive and their regular lives.

title: Sleepless Society: Insomnia
description: Haunted by recurring visions, a young woman with insomnia visits an old home to solve a mystery and put her nightmares to an end.

title: Arrow
description: Based on DC Comics' Green Arrow, an affluent playboy becomes a vengeful superhero, saving the city from villains armed with just a bow and arrows.

title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
description: When Paris is in peril, Marinette becomes Ladybug. Little does she know, her school crush Adrien is actually Cat Noir, another city-saving superhero.

title: The Ghost Bride
description: In 1890s Malacca, Li Lan finds herself in the afterlife and becomes mired in a mystery linked to the sinister, deceased son of a wealthy family.

title: Jamtara - Sabka Number Ayega
description: A group of small-town young men run a lucrative phishing operation, until a corrupt politician wants in on their scheme – and a cop wants to fight it.

title: You
description: Obsessed with an aspiring writer, a charming bookstore manager goes to extreme measures to insert himself into her life.

title: Crazy, Lovely, Cool
description: For a group of charismatic undergraduates, the jolting revelations from a campus blog turn surviving university life into a serious matter.

title: Girls und Panzer
description: Miho Nishizumi tries to escape her family's tradition of tankery by enrolling at a new high school. Instead she gets back into the sport with friends.

title: The Chosen One
description: Determined to bring a Zika vaccine to the remote Pantanal, three doctors clash with a faith healer and are pulled deeper into the mysteries of his cult.

title: Nowhere Man
description: Two nefarious schemes taking place 10 years apart entangle a dauntless triad member, who must break out of prison to rescue a loved one.

title: Bring It On, Ghost
description: A college student with psychic abilities takes in an amnesiac ghost as his roommate – who ends up helping him hunt down spooky spirits.

title: Black Money Love
description: After a cop's fiancée and a jewelry designer's father are found dead together, the two bereaved ones face a perilous aftermath of a theft gone wrong.

title: Cheese in the Trap
description: In this adaptation of a popular webtoon, a poor student trying to navigate college life gains the attention of a wealthy upperclassman with a dark side.

title: Gotham
description: Long before he was commissioner, rookie cop James Gordon takes on Gotham City crime and corruption to avenge the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents.

title: Criminal: Spain
description: Psychological games abound between detectives and suspects in a tense interrogation room, where the search for answers sometimes comes at a moral cost.

title: The Hockey Girls
description: The passionate members of a girls' roller hockey team chase down victories in the rink while striving to make time for school, family and romance.

title: Naruto
description: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

title: Sacred Games
description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

title: Til Death Do Us Part
description: Based on the speculative short stories of MirrorFiction, this sci-fi thriller anthology plunges headlong into our deepest desires – and darkest fears.

title: The Family
description: An enigmatic conservative Christian group known as the Family wields enormous influence in Washington, D.C., in pursuit of its global ambitions.

title: Reply 1994
description: All hailing from various parts of Korea, a group of college students go from being complete strangers to a big happy family at a Seoul boarding house.

title: Reply 1997
description: As a teen, Shi Won was obsessed with a boy band. Now 33 years old, Shi Won and her friends are reviving their memories as their school reunion nears.

title: Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee
description: Jerry Seinfeld's roving talk show combines coffee, laughs and vintage cars into quirky, caffeine-fueled adventures with the sharpest minds in comedy.

title: Bolívar
description: This dramatization depicts the life – and loves – of Venezuelan Gen. Simón Bolívar, who helped liberate several Latin American countries from Spain.

title: Crime Diaries: Night Out
description: After going to a Halloween party, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares is found dead. Was it an accident or murder? Inspired by true events.

title: Persona
description: An exploration of different personas in an eclectic collection of four works by critically acclaimed Korean directors.

title: Hjørdis
description: This miniseries spinoff of "Rita" follows teacher Hjørdis as she plans a school play on bullying featuring a cast of socially awkward students.

title: Innocent
description: In a peaceful, rustic town, a retired officer and his family are mired in a murder mystery riddled with shocking, buried secrets.

title: Watership Down
description: A warren of rabbits battles many threats on their daring journey to find a new home in this adaptation of the classic novel by Richard Adams.

title: Ellen DeGeneres: Relatable
description: In her first special since 2003, Ellen revisits her road to stardom and details the heartfelt – and hilarious – lessons she's learned along the way.

title: Pine Gap
description: At top-secret U.S.-Australian joint defense facility Pine Gap, fissures appear in the critical alliance as spies work with, and against, each other.

title: Age of Rebellion
description: At their high school, a group of unruly teens wreak havoc, face bullies and navigate turbulent lives beyond school grounds.

title: GHOUL
description: When a new prisoner at a military detention center exhibits eerie behavior, a young interrogator’s search for the truth becomes a battle for survival.

title: Take My Brother Away
description: Bickering siblings Shi Miao and Shi Fen tackle friendship matters, school drama and the pitfalls of growing up with little parental supervision.

title: Mr. Sunshine
description: A young boy who ends up in the U.S. after the 1871 Shinmiyangyo incident returns to Korea at a historical turning point and falls for a noblewoman.

title: James Acaster: Repertoire
description: Offbeat comic James Acaster covers the strange, the mundane and everything in between in this collection of four wide-ranging stand-up specials.

title: A.I.C.O.
description: Everything Aiko knew was a lie. Now she's joining a team of Divers to reach the place where the Burst began to stop it for good and save her family.

title: Godzilla
description: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over. But one young man wants revenge above all else.

title: Devilman Crybaby
description: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: After both suffer physical damage – brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

title: Dave Chappelle: Equanimity & The Bird Revelation
description: Comedy titan Dave Chappelle caps a wild year with two stand-up specials packed with scorching new material, self-reflection and tough love.

title: Myths & Monsters
description: This documentary series takes us to the mythic landscapes of Europe to explore some of most enduring legends produced by European culture.

title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
description: Wimpy blue cat Oggy would like nothing more than to snooze, but he's constantly bothered by the three ugly cockroaches who have invaded his home.

title: Glitter Force Doki Doki
description: Four girls summon their inner superheroes to defend Earth and the magical kingdom of Splendorius from King Mercenare and his minions.

title: Ari Shaffir: Double Negative
description: Wry yet thoughtful, comedian Ari Shaffir brings his edgy humor to two fast-paced stand-up specials about children and adulthood.

title: Degrassi: Next Class
description: Degrassi's next generation of high-tech newbies and returning students navigates real-world high school drama. If you're a teen, this is your life.
A genetics professor experiments with a treatment for his comatose sister that blends medical and shamanic cures, but unlocks a shocking side effect.

title: World of Winx
description: The reality show "WOW!" engages the Winx in their mission, starting an undercover, worldly journey in order to make talented kids' dreams come true.

title: Man to Man
description: Disguised as a bodyguard, a special agent must complete his national secret tasks while pandering to the whims of his ill-tempered world star.

title: Hoff the Record
description: TV star David Hasselhoff hopes to reboot his career in the U.K., but both his comeback plans and his personal life keep going off the rails.

title: Dave Chappelle
description: Comedy icon Dave Chappelle makes his triumphant return to the screen with a pair of blistering, fresh stand-up specials.

title: Merlin
description: This family-oriented retelling of the King Arthur legend finds Merlin arriving in Camelot, where he hones his magic skills with the help of his uncle.

title: Old Money
description: Backstabbing, blackmail and revenge consume the dysfunctional family of a wealthy patriarch as they compete to find him a new liver at all costs.

title: Kuromukuro
description: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

title: Hemlock Grove
description: Secrets are just a part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.

title: 7 (Seven)
description: Multiple women report their husbands as missing but when it appears they are looking for the same man, a police officer traces their cryptic connection.

title: Abnormal Summit
description: Led by a trio of Korean celebs, a multinational panel of men engage in – usually – lighthearted debates on issues that surround Korea and beyond.

title: Bitter Daisies
description: While investigating the disappearance of a teen girl in a tight-knit Galician town, a Civil Guard officer uncovers secrets linked to a loss of her own.

title: Brave Miss World
description: Weeks before being named Miss World, Linor Abargil was raped. She tells the world her inspiring true story in this Emmy-nominated documentary.

title: Camelia la Texana
description: Inspired by the famous song "Contrabando y Traición," Camelia, a beautiful girl from San Antonio, kills her lover and becomes a legendary drug runner.

title: Father Brown
description: A modest, compassionate priest doubles as an effective crime solver in this series based on the short stories by G.K. Chesterton.

title: Frozen Planet
description: Go on a journey through the Arctic and Antarctic with this visually stunning program that explores these wildernesses and their inhabitants.

title: Geronimo Stilton
description: With the help of brainy and adventurous sidekicks, New Mouse City's favorite journalist investigates mysteries that take him around the world,

title: Gonul
description: A nurse escapes from her surgeon fiancé after his ex reveals his dark secrets. She later finds love again, but a car accident changes everything.

title: Jack Taylor
description: Ken Bruen's bestselling crime novels leap to life in this series of TV movies featuring Irish cop-turned-private-investigator Jack Taylor.

title: Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell
description: In 1806, ambitious magician Norrell leads a revival of practical magic in England and ignites a fierce rivalry with bold young conjurer Strange.

title: Ken Burns: The Civil War
description: Ken Burns's documentary depicts the action of famous Civil War battles, and relates the stories of soldiers, generals and a beleaguered president.

title: La Viuda Negra
description: Beautiful and ruthless Griselda Blanco, known as the queen of cocaine, becomes Pablo Escobar's boss and governs a world of deceit and death.

title: Lego Friends: Girls on a Mission
description: Five best friends put their teamwork, wits and courage to the test when they take on a mission to protect Heartlake City from bad people.

title: Leyla and Mecnun
description: Destiny brings Mecnun and Leyla together as newborns, and again years later. Despite unexpected turns in Mecnun's zany life, Leyla remains a constant.

title: London Spy
description: When his reclusive-banker lover disappears, a hard-partying young British hedonist plunges into the dangerous world of espionage to find the truth.

title: Maggie & Bianca: Fashion Friends
description: Originally polar opposites, an American fashion student and the daughter of an industry mogul form an everlasting bond and start a rock band in Milan.

title: Mars
description: Fact meets fiction in this docudrama chronicling the journey of a spacecraft crew as it embarks in 2033 on a mission to colonize the red planet.

title: Oliver Stone's Untold History of the United States
description: This documentary series offers an alternative take on modern American history, focusing on underreported events that shaped the nation's character.

title: Planet Earth: The Complete Collection
description: This landmark series transports nature lovers from the Himalayan Mountains to the depths of the ocean and everywhere in between.

title: Revolting Rhymes
description: Popular fairy tales take on a darkly comic edge in these short animated films based on a book by Roald Dahl and illustrator Quentin Blake.

title: Royal Pains
description: Dr. Hank Lawson unexpectedly gets a career upgrade as a freelance physician treating New York's aristocratic upper crust in their posh Hamptons homes.

title: Sadqay Tumhare
description: An arranged engagement between a village girl and her city cousin shows signs of true love, but an indiscretion decades ago could doom their romance.

title: Th Eena Meena Deeka Chase Comedy Show
description: A hungry fox and three resourceful, surprisingly formidable birds turn the animal kingdom on its head in this lively animated series.

title: The Blue Planet: A Natural History of the Oceans
description: David Attenborough narrates this definitive exploration of the marine world, from the familiar to the unknown, revealing the sea and its communities.

title: The Fear
description: Richie Beckett is an aging Brighton crime boss who's struggling with the onset of dementia, just as a rival gang is trying to take over his territory.

title: The Five
description: Twenty years after 5-year-old Jesse disappears near his home, his DNA turns up at the scene of a woman's murder, baffling his family and the police.

title: Toast of London
description: After a divorce and fatal career move, a classically trained British stage actor navigates single life with his odd roommate and takes on horrid jobs.
